altername_name: Die Kristallgrotte: This is E.F. IGES
This is E.F. IGES: Interactive Game Editor System
name: This is E.F. IGES
overview: You can start the program in two ways, go straight to the multi-scrolling shooter game or go to the interactive game creator software that uses this game as a launching point for your own, unique game creations. Strangely, while the game is entirely in English, the creator is in German.
